common: Lactation: Unknown whether distributed in breast milk
Lactation: Unknown whether distributed in breast milk

description.common:
azficel-T, abciximab. Other (see comment). Use Caution/Monitor. 
Comment: Coadministration with anticoagulants or antiplatelets may increase bruising or bleeding at biopsy and/or injection sites; concomitant use not recommended. Decisions regarding continued use or cessation of anticoagulants or antiplatelets should be made by a physician.

azficel-T, alteplase. Other (see comment). Use Caution/Monitor.

adverse effects.name: Hypersensitivity or decreased skin sensation at the injection site
